price: Wͻn mfatoho te sε wͻn a wͻdii wͻn anim kan (Banuu Qainuuqa) a wͻnni akyiri no. Wͻkaa wͻn dwumadie so aba hwεe, na wͻn wͻ asotwe a εyε ya paa.
arabic: كَمَثَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ قَرِيبٗاۖ ذَاقُواْ وَبَالَ أَمۡرِهِمۡ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: kamathali alladhīna min qablihim qarīban dhāqū wabāla amrihim walahum ʿadhābun alīmun
